activities: For our independent contractors located in Switzerland and EU countries, we receive names, emails, location and usernames upon registration. If a contractor chooses to participate in a research project posted on our platform then we collect browsing history, web log information and click stream data while the contractor is logged in our platform participating in research projects.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, email, address, and phone number of independent contractors and site visitors seeking additional information/demo's are collected.
recoursemech: Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc. Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedure
